text:
JMeter/"HTTP Request element" does not follow 301 redirects.

Even if "follow redirects"-checkbox has been checked for a "HTTP request" -
element, "HTTP Request" -element does not follow 301 redirects. Jmeter returns 
the 301 response. HTTP response code 301 means "Permanently moved". 

Jmeter: 1.8, JRE: SUN 1.4.1_01, OS: Windows 2000 WS

It is possible that this is a feature.
creator: jarno.pelkonen@exidio.com

text:
301 redirect did not work for in one test plan, but in other cases it worked 
ok. I need to investigate the problem further.
creator: jarno.pelkonen@exidio.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-editing to close all bugs reported fixed by 1.8.1.
